name: Zelter
description:
Zelter is an survival action game to survive when world fallen by Zombie Apocalypse.
The previous world is ended but you've been survived. Fight back against endless Zombie horde, learn how to survive, gather water and food, find resources to live another days.
Welcome to Zombie Apocalypse
By some unknown causes, Zombie Apocalypse had begun.
You lost your family, friends.
But, you had been saved by a mysterious group. The group accepted you as their family. Through the world was flooded with Zombies, but group members were still saving people without losing their hopes.
After the end of the world, you built civilization with them. Though it was not same as before, you adapted to the new life soon.
Before long, however, the enormous scale of Zombie Horde crushed into your shelter.
You fought tirelessly but that was not enough. you became alone once again.
You Still Think You Can Find A New Hope?
You still think you can fight alone against the endless Zombie Horde?
The core of Zelter is 'Intense survival', 'Huge action', 'Companions', 'Open-world'. You explore ruined cities, fight back Zombies with your companions.
It’s not easy staying alive in a city of Zombies. Gather resources for survival from within the ruins.
24-hours and weather system
Item looting
Item crafting
How long can you run and hide. You can shoot these twisted, abominated creatures. Of course, you might not always have enough bullets.
Intense action
Various weapons
Overwhelming Boss
Two, or three survivors joining forces are better than one. Save other survivors hiding in cities and fight with them. Companions will increase your chance to survive.
Companion & Shelter
Farm
Each gameplay will be unique - explore open-world. Try many different ways. It is not the strong one survive, survivor is only the strong.
